author: felicity
msg: fix mass-check from the updates yesterday and such:
- mass-check would miss the results from all children after it decided
to restart them.  (ie: for n children and a setting of x for restart,
mass-check would lose n-1 results every x messages.)  oops.
- disable caching of data in the sockets
- fix the mass-check progress date printing

author: felicity
msg: a script used by run-masses to spit out the mbox files in the right format for mass-check

author: felicity
msg: Script examples for running mass-checks and doing full corpus runs.
